steps.name: Assert SignUp page url is correct
Assert ChooseProfile page url is correct
Assert CandidateRoleProfile page url is correct
Click on the required option QA
locator.getByText('Type and select strongest tech skills').click
Click on the required option React.js
Click on the required option Node.js
Click on the required option Express.js
Click on the required option Angular.js
Click on the required option Vue.js
Assert CandidateJobExpectationsProfile page url is correct
Click on the required option 1-3 years
Click on the required option Upper intermediate
Wait for city field has value
Assert is remote checkbox is checked
Assert CandidateExperience page url is correct
Assert "Upload from LinkedIn" button is enabled
Select start date month from dropdown
Click on the required option January
Assert "I’m working here" button is active

locator.fill(
• Redesigned existing system and decreased maintainability costs by 30%
• Worked as tech lead in a high-load low-latency system that could serve over 200qps per cluster
• Engineered many own tools like notification engine, performance tool for REST, database client.
• Default unit-test code coverage on products I work on is 75%.
)
Assert profile experience card is visible
Assert content screenshot
